formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'BLACKLIST' =-
[Syntax] BLACKLIST()
[Synopsis] Check if the callerid is on the blacklist
[Description] Uses astdb to check if the Caller*ID is in family 'blacklist'. Returns 1 or 0.
